Compress PDF

Reduce PDF file size smartly. BlinkPDF's Compress PDF tool is fast, private and easy to use.

Use this tool to reduce pdf file size smartly.

Use the upload box above and set basic options here if any.

BlinkPDF's Compress PDF helps you reduce pdf file size smartly. with accuracy and speed. Designed for professionals and casual users alike, it supports large files and keeps your data secure.

Files are processed safely and efficiently. We focus on preserving quality while reducing processing time.

Ideal for daily workflows, academic projects, business reporting and archiving.

  • Secure handling
  • High quality output

How to use

  1. Upload your file(s)
  2. Open Advanced Settings to tweak options if needed
  3. Click Process and download the result

FAQ

A: Yes — files are processed securely and removed after processing.
